main event: A ball of fire green was observed falling straight down at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The observation involved a single object,The sighting occurred at night,The object was estimated to fall from 7000 to 3000 feet,The witness believed it could be a meteor based upon the description,The report was filed by a military source.
witness description: CAPT W H McMURRY/AO 1932937 455 FTF/SOD TRP 7
